verbs.description: red sox hold off yanks in alds game 4 craig kimbrel and [ARG0: the boston red sox] [V: held] off [ARG1: the yankees ninth - inning rally that ended with a video replay eliminating new york with a 4 - 3 victory tuesday night that set up a postseason rematch with the world series champion houston astros trailing in game 4 of the al division series] the yankees scored twice in the ninth and had runners at first and second with two outs gleyber torres hit a slow roller that third baseman eduardo nunez charged and threw across the diamond boston first baseman steve pearce stretched for an outstanding catch that nipped torres the yankees immediately challenged and with a sellout crowd standing and hoping the out call was upheld after a 63-second look j d eduardo nunez boston boston red sox al j d martinez red sox new york gleyber torres houston astros steve pearce eduardo núñez fenway park steve pearce baseball american league new york yankees craig kimbrel yankees
